Allan Vikiru

  Nairobi, Kenya

Hello! My name is Allan, a software engineer who aims to solve problems by conducting informative research and applying effective solutions in Information Technology.
With the skills and knowledge gained, I continually seek to discover and implement techniques that enhance ethical human-computer interaction.

Interests

Besides working on assigned and personal projects, I spend time looking into the latest in technology and other related industries. From trends in UI/UX to IT Law, I follow numerous topics of interest across a variety of reputable digital platforms.

Outside tech, I enjoy listening to music, cooking, gaming, watching sitcoms and writing articles and short stories - though this has been on and off. I generally prefer being indoors, but I'm always open to stepping out for leisure activities.
